name: Sinister Immortal Path
author: Thrush Animation
content: Zhang Yuan ascended to immortality, only to find himself in a bizarre world. Terrifying celestial beings ruled the heavens, while mortals below were mere livestock. The realm was filled with perilous [abnormalities], and the cultivators who survived were barely human. Could this world possibly have a future? Zhang Yuan didn&#039t care. All he wanted was to ascend again and return to the immortal realm. But... could he truly go back?
